assumptions: Classification based on textile upper and rubber outsole.
Value is primarily in the upper.

baseline.rationale: Footwear with textile upper, rubber/plastics outsole, athletic use.

citations.claim: Baseline HTS aligned with textile-upper footwear.
citations.quote: Footwear with outer soles of rubber or plastics, leather or composition leather and uppers of textile materials.

compliance_notes: All recommendations are lawful tariff engineering with documented redesign.
Maintain auditable records for any classification change.

citations.quote: material or component which gives them their essential character.
classification shall be determined according to the terms of the headings and any relative section or chapter notes.

steps.reasoning: Heading text alone does not resolve classification; multiple headings remain plausible.

citations.quote: reference to that article incomplete or unfinished

steps.reasoning: Incomplete or unassembled goods rule not applicable.

citations.quote: material or component which gives them their essential character.

steps.reasoning: Mixture/set classification requires essential character analysis under 3(b).

citations.quote: heading appropriate to the goods to which they are most akin.

steps.reasoning: Packaging rule not needed after GRI_3.

citations.quote: classification of goods in the subheadings of a heading shall be determined according to the terms of those subheadings

steps.reasoning: Subheading selection not required after GRI_3 resolved heading.

mutations.change: Increase felt coverage to qualify for felt-sole notes.
mutations.legal_rationale: Coverage changes can alter outsole material classification.
mutations.rationale: Outsole material coverage can shift HTS notes.
mutations.title: Add felt/fabric outer sole coverage

mutations.change: Reinforce upper with molded TPU panels to dominate external surface area.
mutations.legal_rationale: Upper material drives HTS heading selection.
mutations.rationale: Upper material drives heading for footwear.
mutations.title: Shift upper to predominantly rubber/plastic

mutations.change: Use a molded EVA midsole with thin rubber overlay.
mutations.legal_rationale: Outer sole construction can drive heading under footwear notes.
mutations.rationale: Construction can affect essential character analysis.
mutations.title: Change outsole construction

mutations.change: Increase value share of rubber/plastic overlay components.
mutations.expected_savings_note: Unknown; depends on essential character analysis.
mutations.legal_rationale: GRI essential character depends on component value/role.
mutations.rationale: Component dominance can influence essential character.
mutations.title: Adjust component dominance

mutations.change: Complete substantial transformation in an FTA partner country.
mutations.expected_savings_note: Lower rate via trade program if rules are met.
mutations.legal_rationale: FTA rules of origin require substantial transformation evidence.
mutations.rationale: Origin rules allow reduced duty when substantial transformation occurs.
mutations.title: Move assembly to an FTA partner

mutations.change: Bundle with gaiters/insoles as a set for GRI 3(b) analysis.
mutations.rationale: Set classification can change heading if criteria met.
mutations.title: Package as a set with accessories

mutations.change: Document end-use as athletic training footwear.
mutations.expected_savings_note: May affect subheading if use-based notes apply.
mutations.rationale: Use notes can narrow classification arguments.
mutations.title: Limit intended use to athletic training

mutations.change: Prepare binding ruling request with classification argument.
mutations.rationale: Strong documentation can reduce classification disputes.
mutations.title: Strengthen classification argument

optimized.rationale: Upper material shift lowers heading and ad valorem rate.

proposals.product_summary: Athletic sneaker with textile upper and rubber outsole.

what_if_candidates.change: Shift upper composition to 51% rubber/plastic to change essential character.
legal_risks: Requires lawful redesign and updated documentation.
what_if_candidates.rationale: Material threshold flip may move the heading to rubber/plastics footwear.

what_if_candidates.change: Increase felt outsole coverage beyond note thresholds.
what_if_candidates.rationale: Outsole coverage can influence applicable duty notes.
